tim.pacman

Class AbstractGameControls

  • java.lang.Object
    • tim.pacman.AbstractGameControls
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameControls

    public abstract class AbstractGameControls
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameControls
    A basic implementation of game controls, allows easy access to setting the player location with matching velocity and rotation.
    Author:
    Timothy
